member.name: M:API.Controllers.CamerasController.GetCameras(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get a list of all cameras currently available

member.name: M:API.Controllers.CamerasController.GetSavedCameras(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get a file with all cameraIps from persistent storage
member.returns: A .txt file with all cameraIps registered in persistent storage

member.name: M:API.Controllers.CamerasController.Add(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Add a cameraIp to persistent list
member.param: A cameraIp as a sting. Format: http://10.179.0.43

member.name: M:API.Controllers.CamerasController.Reload(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Fetch zones from all cameras registered in persistent list

member.name: M:API.Controllers.CamerasController.Remove(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Remove a camera from the persistent list of cameraIps

member.name: M:API.Controllers.CamerasController.UploadCameraList(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Upload a .txt file with a list of cameraIps. Check Cameras/Saved for the format
member.param: A .txt file with a list of cameraIps

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ExperimentController.StartExperimentWithImages(System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Int32)
member.summary: Start an experiment that logs and captures Stereo and Validation images
member.param: Interval is in MS and must be > 100

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ExperimentController.StartWithoutImages(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Start an experiment that only captures logs

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ExperimentController.Status(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get information about the current experiment

member.name: M:API.Controllers.MonitoringController.Zones(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get data from all zones on registered cameras

member.name: M:API.Controllers.MonitoringController.Zone(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get data from specific zone by name
member.param: The name of the specific zone, use Zones endpoint to get full list of zones

member.name: M:API.Controllers.MonitoringController.PersonCount(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the total count of persons across all zones

member.name: M:API.Controllers.MonitoringController.Start(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Start the monitoring service to detect people

member.name: M:API.Controllers.MonitoringController.Stop(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Stop the monitoring service, people will not be registered
